title: Drawing, "Panel of Ornament with Grotesque Heads"
medium: Pen and light brown ink, light gray-brown wash on laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and brown ink on verso: sforeta(?) scudi 3
provenance: Giovanni Piancastelli; Mr. and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Motifs of grotesque decoration include foliate-botto genius

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Panel of Ornament with Grotesque Heads".
Pen and light brown ink, light gray-brown wash on laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-2671.
